TopicTitle: Ksp crashes when eva on the mun

Articles.Content: I landed on the mun just recently and my game crashes when the kerbal touches the mun after dropping from the rocket! Any suggestions what to do?

Sounds like this confirmed bug to me

https://bugs.kerbalspaceprogram.com/issues/23977
Can confirm, happens to me as well.

Hi! I'm pretty sure there's others with the same problem in the forum.

I'm sorry I didn't have the time to link it but its title is quite easy to spot.

Hope I helped!
